text: samood ko aur usake bhaee saaleh ko bheja. usane kaha, "ai meree qaî€¼aum ke logon! allaah kee bandagee karo. usake siva tumhaara koee any poojy-prabhu nahin. usee ne tumhen dharatee se paida kiya aur usamen tumhen basaayaay atah usase kshama maango; phir usakee or palat aao. nissandeh mera rab nikat hai, praarthanaon ko sveekaar karanevaala bhee.
